title: The ability to ff before 20
body: I just got done with 2 matches with people who fed because they didn't get their lane, and by feed I mean buying troll items and running straight into the enemy while putting up no fight. The matches went on for around 36 minutes. Just something to pull the plug on the match.

replies.body: they really need to change it to majority rules. i dont understand why the surrender doesnt work if its 3 against 2. especially in a dou where the 2 obviously will not surrender in a losing game it makes no sense. either change it to where 3/2 vote gets the surrender to go off, or have it to where duo's only count as 1 vote!
Not sure how that can be identified, but I do agree on majority rules.
People hate surrendering so much it would rarely matter.  Usually you're going to be stuck anyway because all it takes is 2 people to stall a game out.
issue starts at head of community.  They aren't active members in our community. How would they fix it?
